ing: 1/2 pound plums, pitted and chopped into small bite-size pieces
1 fresh pineapple - peeled, cored and chopped into small bite-size pieces
4 cups strong brewed black tea, chilled
des: "This Mexican punch is quite flavorful. With or without the fruit floating in your glass, it makes for a nice beverage."
ins: In a large punch bowl, combine orange juice, lemon juice, grapes, plums and pineapple. Stir in sugar. Pour in tea and crushed ice.
